mapper.insert: insert into oa_sys.leave (uid, start_time, end_time, reason, nextUid, releaseUid) values (#{uid}, #{start_time}, #{end_time}, #{reason}, #{nextUid}, #{releaseUid})
mapper.select: select uid, releaseUid, reason, start_time, end_time, status, count, nextUid, reject_reason, create_time, update_time from oa_sys.leave where releaseUid = #{releaseUid} and status >= 0 order by update_time desc limit 1
select uid, reason, start_time, end_time, status, count, nextUid, reject_reason, create_time, update_time from oa_sys.leave where releaseUid = #{releaseUid} and status >= 0 order by update_time desc
select uid, releaseUid, reason, start_time, end_time, status, count, nextUid, reject_reason, create_time, update_time from oa_sys.leave where uid = #{uid}
mapper.update: update oa_sys.leave set reason = #{reason}, start_time = #{start_time}, end_time = #{end_time}, status = #{status}, count = #{count}, nextUid= #{nextUid} where uid = #{uid}
